clearcontrol.microscope.state

Class AcquisitionStateManager<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.microscope.state.AcquisitionStateManager<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - state
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature

    public class AcquisitionStateManager<S extends AcquisitionStateInterface<?,?>>
extends VirtualDevice
implements ReadOnlyNameableInterface, LoggingFeature
    The acquisition state manager handles a set of saved acquisition states. These states are used for acquisition purposes.
    Author:
    royer
